title: bring caffe2::Tensor API closer to aten/pytorch
body_html:
Summary:
For tensor, we plan to do the following renaming:

* t.ndim() → t.dim()
* t.size() → t.numel()
* dims() → t.sizes()
* t.meta() → t.dtype()
* t.dim(d) → t.size(d)

This diff adds new APIs in caffe2::Tensor so we can start codemod,
we'll remove old API after the codemod

Reviewed By: ezyang

Differential Revision: D10856028

body:
Summary:
For tensor, we plan to do the following renaming:
```
* t.ndim() → t.dim()
* t.size() → t.numel()
* dims() → t.sizes()
* t.meta() → t.dtype()
* t.dim(d) → t.size(d)
```
This diff adds new APIs in caffe2::Tensor so we can start codemod,
we'll remove old API after the codemod

Reviewed By: ezyang

Differential Revision: D10856028
